title: The Only Thing Rappers and Queen Elizabeth II Have in Common
text: CAM NEWTON, the quarterback for the Carolina Panthers, has sat out the past two games with a foot injury. Though not a great loss for Panthers’ fans–backup quarterback Kyle Allen is faring just fine–Mr. Newton’s absence has devastated fans of his post-game outfits. Week after week, the three-time Pro Bowler is known for strolling into press conferences in outfits that range from peacock-worthy to preposterous. He’s worn a flat-brim fedora the color of Jim Carrey’s “Mask” costume, a sportcoat with the sleeves cut off, even a fez. Reader, the man has worn a fez. (The Panthers organization did not respond to requests to...
description: Babushkas, the ornate headscarves worn by Russian grandmothers, have been showing up on fashionable NFL players, rappers like A$AP Rocky and male runway models. What’s behind this curious trend?
